title: India Handicrafts & Gifts Fair enters 40th Edition (Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of India ) The 40th edition of world's largest handicrafts and gifts fair, IHGF Delhi Fair Autumn 2015 (earlier known as IHGF) will be held from 14 - 18 October, 2015 at India Expo Centre
